response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $15,000 to you. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $12,000. This is a fantastic deal, offering you a significant saving of $3,000 compared to its market value. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties. Should you be interested, please let me know promptly so we can finalize the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
